title: BRIEF-Joseph Payne Says "Rejects" Arcturus Therapeutics' Board Of Directors' Latest Lawsuit Against Payne
text:
April 23, 2018 / 1:40 PM / Updated 30 minutes ago BRIEF-Joseph Payne Says "Rejects" Arcturus Therapeutics' Board Of Directors' Latest Lawsuit Against Payne Reuters Staff 
April 23 (Reuters) - Arcturus Therapeutics Ltd: 
* JOSEPH PAYNE SAYS “REJECTS” ARCTURUS THERAPEUTICS’ BOARD OF DIRECTORS’ LATEST LAWSUIT AGAINST PAYNE 
* JOSEPH PAYNE SAYS OWNS APPROXIMATELY 13.7% OF ISSUED AND OUTSTANDING SHARES OF ARCTURUS THERAPEUTICS 
* JOSEPH PAYNE SAYS URGES ARCTURUS THERAPEUTICS’ BOARD TO SET DATE FOR THE EXTRAORDINARY GENERAL MEETING THAT PAYNE FILED FORMAL REQUEST FOR ON FEB 12 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
